titleStmt.title: A decree of Starre-Chamber: concerning inmates, and diuided tenements in London or three miles about: made the fourteenth of February last past. 1636.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Court of Star Chamber.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiesty: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Restricting their number and requiring provision for the poor--STC.
Last leaf probably blank, lacking--Folger catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
